data.description: Convex sets in finite-dimensional spaces: relative interiors, separation, set operations. Convex functions: conjugacy, subdifferentials and directional derivations, functional operations, Fenchel-Rockafellar duality. Applications to operations research and related areas.  Students taking this course are strongly encouraged to have had a course in basic analysis (e.g.MATH 521) and a course in linear algebra (e.g.,MATH 340).
data.title: CONVEX ANALYSIS
